titles: A learned and a godly sermon, to be read of all men, but especially for all marryners, captaynes and passengers, which trauell the seas, preached by Iohn Madoxe, maister of arte, and fellow of All soules in Oxforde, at Waymouth and Melcombe regis, a porte in the countrie of Dorsett, the 3. day of October, in the yeere of our Lord. 1581
author: Madox, Richard, 1546-1583.
Martin, Thomas, d. 1584.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Sailors --  Religious life --  Sermons --  Early works to 1800.
